reviews.name: Personalized "Love Shack" Doormat 17x27
reviews.reviewText: The letters and numbers were exactly the way I had ordered. The quality is very good and looks just like the picture online.
reviews.title: nothing to step over

reviews.name: Personalized "Love Shack" Doormat 17x27
reviews.reviewText: This is the 3rd in our doormat collection(buying easter next) and we have been so very pleased with them all. Halloween and Christmas are the other 2 purchased and we now but them for gifts for the parents(grandparents) and they love the personalized aspect. They actually keep them in their homes as decorations( they have Christmas and easter). I do wish there were some for other holidays especially thanksgiving, 4th of july etc. Maybe something fun for the 4 seasons would be great too and I would buy them all.
reviews.title: perfect

reviews.name: Personalized "Love Shack" Doormat 17x27
reviews.reviewText: I really love this rug especially it matches the rest of my home decor
reviews.title: love mat

reviews.name: Personalized "Love Shack" Doormat 17x27
reviews.reviewText: Turned out perfect!!!!!! So cute - everyone at work loved it - orders should be flowing in. So adorable for a wedding shower gift!!!
reviews.title: Awesome Mat!!!
